INSERT INTO sc_payroll_dispatch ( app_id, customer_id, dept_id, period, payroll_name, payroll_type, salary_type, reference_id, employee_count, payable_total, actual_total, content, hide_empty, dispatch_date, template_id, title, state, is_delete, creator_id, modifier_id, create_date, modify_date ) VALUES ( #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{period,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{payrollName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payrollType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{salaryType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{referenceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{employeeCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payableTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{actualTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hideEmpty,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{dispatchDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{templateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
